mapper.insert: insert into interview (interviewee_id, position_id, interview_interviewer, interview_location, interview_time) values (#{intervieweeId}, #{positionId}, #{interviewInterviewer}, #{interviewLocation}, #{interviewTime})
mapper.select: select interview_id, interview.interviewee_id, interview.position_id, interview.interview_interviewer, interviewee_name, interviewee_age, position_name, emp_name, interview_location, interview_time from interview inner join interviewee_info on interview.interviewee_id=interviewee_info.interviewee_id inner join emp on emp_id=interview_interviewer inner join empty_position on interview.position_id=empty_position.position_id
